content:
Agent Empowerment Tools from Workforce Engagement.

Retain high performers with career development opportunities, organization enhancements, and schedule ownership.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Workforce Engagement is available in Lightning Experience. Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions.
NOTE Workforce Engagement is scheduled for retirement.

Agent Home:
Give agents a home base to see their schedule for the current week.

Agent Engagement:
Empower agents with enablement sites (myTrailhead) and skills development. Create custom trails and modules. Associate learning with skills and assign them to agents based on module completion.

Service Resource Preferences:
Allow agents to specify work preferences. Scheduling tools consider these when assigning shifts.

Time Sheets and Time-Off Requests:
Submit time sheets to managers. Notify planners and team leads of planned absences.
title: Agent Empowerment Tools in Workforce Engagement
